SQLDataSource.Name: C_EA_CUST_ORDER_WORK_ORDER
SQLDataSource.Where: order_no IN (SELECT a.order_no FROM &AO.CUSTOMER_ORDER a, &AO.CUSTOMER_ORDER_LINE b WHERE a.ORDER_NO = b.ORDER_NO AND a.state ='Planned' AND (b.line_no =1 AND b.demand_code ='Work Order') ) AND company LIKE NVL('$COMPANY$','%') AND contract LIKE NVL('$CONTRACT$','%')
